section.name: News
section.p: Version 2.1 has been released, as of 2004-07-06. A single, yet very important bugfix made.
Version 2.0 has been released, as of 2004-06-20. A rewrite of the innards to make it simpler and faster.
Version 1.0 has been released, as of 2003-12-08 after being refactored out of genjava-core 2.2.
